description:
Libre Baskerville is a web font optimized for body text (typically 16px.) It is based on the American Type Founder's Baskerville from 1941, but it has a taller x-height, wider counters and less contrast that allow it to work on small sizes in any screen.

![Libre Baskerville sample](https://imgs1.fontbrain.com/imgs/c5/d9/609b9a33bff8b5b193731d789d70/sp-720x400-333333-penultimate.png)
author: Pablo Impallari,  Rodrigo Fuenzalida
